# validationMetrics

**Instance Property**

Measurements of the image classifier’s performance on the validation dataset.

## Declaration

```swift
var validationMetrics: MLClassifierMetrics { get }
```

## Evaluating an image classifier

- **evaluation(on:)**: Generates metrics describing the image classifier’s performance on labeled images represented by a data source.
- **trainingMetrics**: Measurements of the classifier’s performance on the training data set.
